subject: Fencing (Sport)
Olympic Games
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Woyda was an Olympic champion fencer who was atypically short for his native Poland but who compensated for a lack of reach with dazzling dexterity.
snippet: Mr. Woyda was an Olympic champion fencer who was atypically short for his native Poland but who compensated for a lack of reach with dazzling dexterity.
